name: TITAN 3D - XMAS EDITION
description:
TITAN 3D - XMAS EDITION IS A NEW VERSION OF THE ORIGINAL TITAN 3D THAT INCLUDES 10 NEW LEVELS, 3 NEW ENEMIES AND 3 NEW WEAPONS ALL WITH A CHRISTMAS THEMED TWIST.

FEATURES:

-3 NEW WEAPONS/1 NEW MODIFIED WEAPON!

-4 NEW SPRITES

-10 NEW LEVELS

-2 NEW SCENERY AND WALLS

-NEW GUI

GAME PLAYS ON WINDOWS XP, 7, 8, 10

__________UPDATES: ___________

1.0.2.2 DECEMBER 17 2016: FIXED BUGS, FIXED ROOF AND FLOOR TEXTURES.
